introduction: Je suis programmeuse front-end en React.
title: Kim Hawthorne — programmeuse front-end
about-me-blurb: Je suis Kim, une programmeuse front-end. Je viens de Chicago mais c'est maintenant à Montréal {montrealEmoji} que je suis chez moi. J'adore mon chat (Lola) {catEmoji}, cuisinier les repas végétariens {vegetableEmoji} et chercher des biens vintages {vintageEmoji}.
about-wants-slack: Il faut utiliser Slack for communiquer au travail (je plaisante, en quelque sorte)
about-wants-hybrid: Mélange de travail à distance et en présentiel
accessibility-prompt: Allumez votre lecteur d'écran pour l'expérience accessible!
education-concordia-degree: Maîtrise de Traductologie, du français vers l'anglais
languageToggle-ariaLabel: Choississez votre langue. Vous êtes actuellement en français.
interests-hooks: All the React hooks — <bold>state, reducers, context, effects</bold>!
interests-localization: Localization challenges such as pluralization, inserting dynamic values and translating ARIA attributes
interests-reactHookForms: Discovering the joys of using hooks for building complex forms with React Hook Forms
interests-cssInJs: CSS in JS — used for this portfolio
header-introduction: Je suis Kim, une programmeuse front-end en React.
jobs-fcb-task-emails: Code HTML emails in an agency environment
jobs-fcb-task-clients: Manage all email projects for several large clients
jobs-fcb-task-compataibility: Ensure compatability across all modern and some legacy email clients
jobs-fcb-task-template: Design and build modular email template system to streamline email production process
jobs-footlocker-task-sprintTeams: Work on multiple sprints teams to build and support front-end platform for Foot Locker multinational brands
jobs-footlocker-task-reactRedux: Use React and Typescript  to create UIs and components, and Redux to manage application state
jobs-footlocker-task-accessibility: Focus on web accessibility, including focus management for keyboard interactions, aria attributes for screen reader announcements and CSS considerations
jobs-footlocker-task-accessibleCommonCom: Build fully accessible common components, including tabs, accordions, tooltips and dropdowns
jobs-footlocker-task-technicalDebt: Lead refactoring efforts to address technical debt including cart, checkout, header, forms, product details page and typeahead search
jobs-footlocker-task-localization: Assist in localizing the platform to support multiple languages and currencies, following best localization practices
jobs-footlocker-task-deviceCompatibility: Ensure UI functions correctly in all mobile devices, screen readers and common browsers, including Internet Explorer 11
jobs-footlocker-task-codeReview: Review and approve colleagues’ code to ensure quality, consistency and accessibility compliance
jobs-footlocker-task-unitTests: Write unit and functional tests in jest
jobs-footlocker-task-aem: Work with Adobe Experience Manager developers to render configurable marketing content
jobs-footlocker-task-uiuxCollaboration: Work closely with UI/UX team to implement new designs aligned to style guides and brand standards
jobs-grainger-task-featuresAndMaintain: Built new features and maintained existing functionality on grainger.com, a large e-commerce website
jobs-grainger-task-searchSelect: Acted as lead front-end developer on a team responsible for improving user experience in searching and selecting products
jobs-grainger-task-tieredPricing: Managed front-end development for tiered pricing project under a tight deadline
jobs-grainger-task-collaboration: Collaborated with product owners, back-end developers, UX/UI and QA in an agile environment
jobs-grainger-task-compatability: Ensured cross-browser and backwards compatibility, including Internet Explorer 7 and up
skills-languages-webpack: Familiarity with webpack and build tools
skills-skills-collaboration: Highly collaborative with QA and UI/UX
